changelog.change: Fixed a bug where splits where incorrectly read from the .lss file
HUD will be set to ON automatically each time the timer starts (this is not reflected in the game's settings, but the HUD will be drawn)
Added item pickup flags autosplitting
Added a timer lock feature, use this to prepare NG+ save files for use with SoulSplitter
Added autosplitting for all bosses and all grace
Made searching for bosses and graces a little easier
WARNING: this will once again require reconfiguring of your splits, sorry for the inconvenience
Added autosplitting on most graces on the route
Added flag autosplitting - these will support any event flag the game sets
WARNING: the boss splits you have configured will be removed when updating, to accommodate the new split types - maybe it is wise to back up your splits in case anything goes wrong
Hotfix for a scan error
Added autosplitting for a couple bosses
Elden Ring 1.04 compatibility
Removed RTA. MIGT is not always active
Added button to the troubleshooting wiki page
If a splits file has settings from another livesplit plugin, soulsplitter will ignore it and initialize with default settings, instead of reading it as it's own settings.
Removed pattern scan cache altogether, hopefully fixes a crash loop
Fixed a bug where the game's version was incorrectly detected on the Japanese version
Fixed a bug where when running mixed versions of the game, a cache problem would lead to a crash
Changed default timing method from RTA to IGT.
Clarified in the UI that the initial black screen removal will only work if you let SoulSplitter auto-start.
Moved SoulSplitter's errors into it's UI instead of it being visible in livesplit's UI. Also added the version there for reference.
Couple more small UI fixes
IGT is now modified IGT - framerate issues will not affect IGT and IGT will be consistent for every runner. Made possible by B3.
IGT is now reset to 0 after the initial cutscene + hardware dependent blackscreen, starting the timer at 0 when you gain control of the player.
Bugfix screen state offset for 1.03.1 - caused timer to not run.
Bugfix screen state offset changed for 1.03 - caused timer to not run.
Fix pattern scan for 1.03.
SoulSplitter now scans for both eldenring.exe and start_protected_game.exe, to support both EAC bypass methods.
Fixed horizontal layout
Added error output to help diagnose problems
Changed auto update URL
Settings now get saved.
Choosing IGT or RTA now matters, only one can be active. You can split again during load screens.
Fixed memory scan for 1.02.3 - backwards compatible with .2. Hopefully also forwards compatible when the time comes.
Fixed memory scan for 1.02.3 - backwards compatible with .2. Hopefully also forwards compatible when the time comes.
Fixed a bug that would make the library not load when a pattern scan failed
Fixed memory scan for 1.02.2
Initial
